verses.verse: And Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood: <S%H6086><s%> two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> of it, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height <S%H6967><s%> of it:

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> within <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> and without, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> to it round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> to be set by <S%H5921><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6471><s%> of it; even two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it, and two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And he put <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold: <S%H2091><s%> two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and one cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubims <S%H3742><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> beaten out of one piece <S%H4749><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he them, on the two <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the mercy seat; <S%H3727><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> on the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7098><s%> on this side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> on the other end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7098><s%> on that side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he <S%H853><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> on the two <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> thereof.

And the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> spread out <S%H6566><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> on high, <S%H4605><s%> and covered <S%H5526><s%> with their wings <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the mercy seat, <S%H3727><s%> with their faces <S%H6440><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another; <S%H251><s%> even to <S%H413><s%> the mercy seatward <S%H3727><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the cherubims. <S%H3742><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood: <S%H6086><s%> two cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof:
And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> thereunto a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

Also he made <S%H6213><s%> thereunto a border <S%H4526><s%> of a handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> round about; <S%H5439><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for the border <S%H4526><s%> thereof round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And he cast <S%H3332><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the rings <S%H2885><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in the four <S%H702><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> thereof.

Over against <S%H5980><s%> the border <S%H4526><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> the rings, <S%H2885><s%> the places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the table. <S%H7979><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold, <S%H2091><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the table. <S%H7979><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were upon <S%H5921><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> <S%H853><s%> his dishes, <S%H7086><s%> and his spoons, <S%H3709><s%> and his bowls, <S%H4518><s%> and his covers <S%H7184><s%> to cover <S%H5258><s%> withal, <S%H2004><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold: <S%H2091><s%> of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he <S%H853><s%> the candlestick; <S%H4501><s%> his shaft, <S%H3409><s%> and his branch, <S%H7070><s%> his bowls, <S%H1375><s%> his knops, <S%H3730><s%> and his flowers, <S%H6525><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same:

And six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of the sides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> thereof; three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the one side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> <S%H259><s%> thereof, and three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the other side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> <S%H8145><s%> thereof:

Three <S%H7969><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made after the fashion of almonds <S%H8246><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> branch, <S%H7070><s%> a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower; <S%H6525><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made like almonds <S%H8246><s%> in another <S%H259><s%> branch, <S%H7070><s%> a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower: <S%H6525><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> throughout the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the candlestick. <S%H4501><s%>
And in the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> were four <S%H702><s%> bowls <S%H1375><s%> made like almonds, <S%H8246><s%> his knops, <S%H3730><s%> and his flowers: <S%H6525><s%>

And a knop <S%H3730><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same, and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same, and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same, according to the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it.

Their knops <S%H3730><s%> and their branches <S%H7070><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same: all <S%H3605><s%> of it was one <S%H259><s%> beaten work <S%H4749><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>
And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> his seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps, <S%H5216><s%> and his snuffers, <S%H4457><s%> and his censers, <S%H4289><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>
Of a talent <S%H3603><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he it, and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the incense <S%H7004><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood: <S%H6086><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> of it was a cubit, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it a cubit; <S%H520><s%> it was foursquare; <S%H7251><s%> and two cubits <S%H520><s%> was the height <S%H6967><s%> of it; the horns <S%H7161><s%> thereof were <S%H1961><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same.

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> <S%H853><s%> both the top <S%H1406><s%> of it, and the sides <S%H7023><s%> thereof round about, <S%H5439><s%> and the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it: also he made <S%H6213><s%> unto it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for it under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the crown <S%H2213><s%> thereof, by <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> corners <S%H6763><s%> of it, upon <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6654><s%> thereof, to be places <S%H1004><s%> for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it withal.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the pure <S%H2889><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet spices, <S%H5561><s%> according to the work <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary. <S%H7543><s%>
